bb.desc: 29 combo powerful Earth attack on all foes, 3 combo powerful Earth attack on single foe, hugely boosts Spark damage for 3 turns, Spark damage boosts BB gauge and slightly restores HP [400-500 HP] for 3 turns & adds probable random status ailment infliction counter for 3 turns
bb.name: Briar Storm

dictionary.description:
Orphaned at a young age, Avani grew up never knowing the faces of her parents. As a young Morokai cub, she had to fight tooth and nail in order to survive. Her hard won freedom and fame was a testament to her own strengths and accomplishments as a monster hunter.
Avani valued two things above all else in life. First, her freedom. Avani believed in living her life to the fullest and taking matters into her own hands. She did as she pleased and none could tell her otherwise. Second, her family. Although she had no relatives to speak of, Avani cherished the bonds she forged with the countless people she encountered in her life. Those who joined Avani under the banner of Clan Rih'alnase were her family, and she was fiercely protective of them.
Avani had no interest in the war between the Deva and Morokai. When she ignored Overlord Azurai's call to join in the war efforts, the Overlord himself sent his men to exterminate Rih'alnase, just to make an example out of them for disobeying him. Avani and her people were on the run ever since, but the longer they ran, the more people she lost along the way. Desperate and furious, Avani decided to strike back at the Overlord to show that she would not to be bullied into submission.
dictionary.evolution: Rih'alnase will not suffer this injustice! We will take a stand, and put that wretched cur in his place!
dictionary.fusion: Amidst these trying times, you continue to stand by our side. Words cannot describe how much this means to me, my friend.
dictionary.summon: As Chieftain of the Rih'alnase, you, my family, are my responsibility. Until my dying breath, I will fight for a brighter future!
